formatDescription: SuperCard Pro Image File is a RAW flux format for the SuperCard Pro software and is used by many flux boards such as the Greaseweazle. It handles images for any type of floppy disk as well as tape drives and hard drives that are MFM, RLL or GCR encoded.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: SuperCard Image Pro
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 0; Magic Bytes: 'SCP' and EOF; Offset: 0; Magic Bytes: 'FPCS'
